title: Anantham Anantham Padum Female Song Lyrics in Tamil
stanzas:
anantham anantham padum
manam aasaiyin oonjalil aadum
aayiram aayiram kaalam
indha niyabagam
poo mazhai thoovum

kaatrinil saaral
pola paaduven.
pookkalil thendral
polaÂ  thaeduven.

nee varum paadhaiyil
kangalal thavam iruppen (2)

anantham anantham padum
manam aasaiyin oonjalil aadum
aayiram aayiram kaalam
indha niyabagam
poo mazhai thoovum

unnai paartha naalilthaan
kannil paarvai thondriyadhu
undhan perai sollithaan
endhan baashai thondriyadhu

unnai moodi vaikathaan
kannil imaigal thondriyadhu
unnai soodi paarkathaan
pookkal maalai aagiyadhu

nee ennai serndhidum varaiyil
idhayathil swasangal illai
nee vandhu thangiya nenjil
yaarukkum idame illai

paarthu paarthu yaengiya
sondham vaasalil
vandhu serndhadhe

anantham anantham padum
manam aasaiyin oonjalil aadum
aayiram aayiram kaalam
indha niyabagam
poo mazhai thoovum

unnai neengi ennaalum
endhan jeevan vazhaadhu
undhan anbil vazhvatharku
jenmam ondru podhaadhu

unnai ennum ullathil
veru ennam thondraadhu
kaatru nindru ponaalum
kadhal nindru pogaadhu

engengo thaediya vazhvai
un sondham thandhadhu ingae
sandhangal thaediya vaarthai
sangeetham aanathu ingae.

aasai kadhal kaigalil
serndhaal vazhve
sorgam aagume.

anantham anantham padum
manam aasaiyin oonjalil aadum
